message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: public static Entry<String, Integer> findLowest(Map<String, Integer> map) {
    int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
    Map.Entry<String, Integer> minEntry = null;

    for (Map.Entry<String, Integer> entry : map.entrySet()) {
        if (entry.getValue() < min) {
            min = entry.getValue();
            minEntry = entry;
        }
    }

    return minEntry;
}
<<<explanation>>>: The code iterates over each entry in the map. If the value of the current entry is less than the current minimum, it updates the minimum and keeps track of the entry with the lowest value. At the end of the loop, it returns the entry with the lowest value.
